LanguageData.PlantShrubLow.label: low shrubs
LanguageData.PlantShrubLow.description: Low broadleaf shrubs. These grow in clusters and slow down movement somewhat.
LanguageData.PlantAlocasia.label: alocasia
LanguageData.PlantClivia.label: clivia
LanguageData.PlantClivia.description: An unusual plant with tall, pretty flowers. Some call it the 'bush lily'.
LanguageData.PlantRafflesia.label: giant rafflesia
LanguageData.PlantRafflesia.description: A rare, giant flower. You would think a giant flower would be beautiful, but this one is quite smelly and ugly.
LanguageData.PlantTreeTeak.label: teak tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeTeak.description: A very strong hardwood tree, used in ancient times to build sailing ships.
LanguageData.PlantTreeCecropia.label: cecropia tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeCecropia.description: One of the most common rainforest trees. Grows very fast, but yields little usable wood.
LanguageData.PlantTreePalm.label: palm tree
LanguageData.PlantTreePalm.description: A tropical tree with a long, naked trunk topped by a cluster of leaves.
LanguageData.PlantTreeBamboo.label: bamboo tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeBamboo.description: A fast-growing tree-like species that grows in cluster. Bamboo can be harvested for a wood-like material. The plant itself is not beautiful.
